Package Tools

Class LoadGame

java.lang.Object
Tools.LoadGame
public class LoadGame extends Object
The LoadGame class has the functionality to load a game state from a file.

    • loadgame

      public static void loadgame(String p_filename, Connectivity connectivity, GameEngine ge) throws FileNotFoundException
      Used to load the game state from a file.
      Parameters:
      p_filename - The name of the file containing the game state.
      connectivity - Connectivity object
      ge - GameEngine object.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - To handle if file is not found.
